Articles.Content:
So Tosh, besides the RCS - only Gemini, what\'s next for you?

I\'m currently in the project I would not like to disclose (as I\'m not the one who leads the job). Next will be RCS-Gemini. Next... I think I\'ll finish with it.

So Tosh, besides the RCS - only Gemini, what\'s next for you?

Moderfu(*&^$ helichoppers! thats what

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=6821.0

Moderfu(*&^$ helichoppers!

Mother-what-doin\' helichoppers? ???

Ah, Rule 34, I see

Yup. Titan IIIC-MOL.

I think I need to reskin the upper tank to make it really look like a laboratory
For me, the textures on the pod are rotated 90*, towards the left, facing from engine->parachute.

For me, the textures on the pod are rotated 90*, towards the left, facing from engine->parachute.
+1.

It\'s already on my ToDo list. I\'ll fix it when I have time.

+1.

It\'s already on my ToDo list. I\'ll fix it when I have time.

Thanks :3.

You could make it as a deployable side-mounted parachute...

But yeah, to be perfect, it would also need deployable skids...

Hey guys ! now that we have 0.14 we can ! we 'just' have to understand how the gear works, and that\'s OK for the skids ! Next 'just' model a working rogallo wing !

I think that the landings are going to be...really kerbal ;P

[EDIT]: I searched around the config files and you don\'t even need to create skids yourself, you can modify the deploy angle, orientation... next re-texture it a little and you\'re done !

Going to try to fit a radial parachute on the gemini with those skids, to see if it can work...

Are you going to make a Titan to go with it?

I\'ve tried to replicate a Titan using NovaPunch parts, but the Twin Bertha Lite engine is too weak for a first stage.

Are you going to make a Titan to go with it?
Nope.

Use Saturn V mod

I\'ve done that. But the real Gemini was launched using the Titan, not Saturn. Not to mention it looks quite cool.

http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gemini-Titan_GLV

Maybe I\'ll ask Feanor. He\'s making ICBMs anyway, and Titan is basically just that.
Just learned that parachutes can\'t produce lift,only drag, so no paraglider but maybe the paraglider would be visual, and then we have two invisible winglets with high lift ?

Maybe I\'ll ask Feanor. He\'s making ICBMs anyway, and Titan is basically just that.
You may also increase Twin Bertha\'s thrust manually. See maxThrust parameter in KSP\Parts\NP_1.75mTwinBerthaEngine\part.cfg file.
Just learned that parachutes can\'t produce lift,only drag, so no paraglider but maybe the paraglider would be visual, and then we have two invisible winglets with high lift ?
I\'d wait till plugin documentation is released. Probably custom module DLL could provide some means to create a deployable part with lift.
Trying to re-enact the gemini 6-7.

OK, I\'ve set to make a Titan II myself, and I\'m doing fairly well. Maybe I\'ll also make other rockets of that family.

BTW, I\'ve read a few things on Gemini, and it turns out it had a lot of things you didn\'t simulate (though they\'re modeled, as it turns out).

Among these are four de-orbiting rockets and RCS system. Could you add them to the capsule? It\'d help with re-enecting missions once I\'ve perfected the Titan II (and especially once the docking is added, since I\'m planning to make a Titan III with Agena upper stage).

Among these are four de-orbiting rockets and RCS system. Could you add them to the capsule?

RCS: yes, it\'s planned. Though I\'m not sure when I gonna release that.

Rockets: no.

OK. Shame about the deorbiting retros though. If I\'m not mistaken, these are the 'pop-up' looking parts, right?

Maybe after more complex animation is implemented, they could look awesome popping up and firing (unless these are not retros, in which case nevermind).
Gemini modules always looked mopey to me, what with the to windows that look like eyes and the large \'nose\' and all.
To mod team: as I still consider this topic as \'active\' please do not archive it in the course of forum maintenance.

Glad to see I\'m not the only Gemini fanboy \'round these parts.

Now to do what NASA couldn\'t... Direct ascent Mun landing with Gemini!
As someone who watched Gemini missions as a kid, I must say I\'m incredibly impressed with the work on this addon. Well done! And thanks!
Now that we have animations, how about opening (pod bay) doors? And maybe with little kerbals inside?

Tried to download this add-on, got all excited about the Gemini parts, but says I don\'t have access to that part of the forum.

Activated/Registered with the forum. Is this add-on still available?

Thanks!
Works for me.

Tried to download this add-on, got all excited about the Gemini parts, but says I don\'t have access to that part of the forum.

Activated/Registered with the forum. Is this add-on still available?

Thanks!

Correction, from the front page display-case, I get that error, when I drill down into the official forum heading, I can DL it. I got it now! Can\'t wait!

Thanks!
